attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Britannia will be removed from British coinage for the first time in over 300 years.
Her figure is the personification of Britain.
Removing Britannia is to remove a symbol for patriotism and unity in these Isles.
She must remain.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
